FuncDef:
The tunnel-prefer segment-routing command enables SR-MPLS BE tunnels to take precedence over LDP tunnels.
The undo tunnel-prefer segment-routing command disables SR-MPLS BE tunnels from taking precedence over LDP tunnels.
By default, LDP tunnels take precedence over SR-MPLS BE tunnels.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a tunnel recursion scenario, an LDP tunnel is preferentially selected to forward traffic by default. To enable a device to preferentially select an SR-MPLS BE tunnel, run the tunnel-prefer segment-routing command.
